text:
[vroom-ios/] 2 new commits:
[vroom-ios/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/vroom-ios/commits/e384f70baa96df23274a98a2a00ccfd35a8c5da5|e384f70baa96>: make tooltips match design
 - mattwymore
[vroom-ios/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/vroom-ios/commits/6d9f5f2d00521320a1a875feb8976cd73d698fe3|6d9f5f2d0052>: merging
 - mattwymore
is Trent around if we need any assets?
yes, he should be
let me know if you need help wrangling

Team vroom! Taking a meeting break (been talking about vroom, actually) <@U0289USNA> <@U02895311> - how's it going? Can I help at all this weekend? I'm gonna be doing the meeting stuff more so I won't be able to respond right away. Lmk how it's going etc!
Vroom vroom!!

<@U026103R3>:  from Apple's HIG - "If possible, avoid sending users to Settings. It’s important to remember that users can’t open the Settings app without first switching away from your app, and you don’t want to encourage this action."
hmm
that's lame
The reality of this is that you shouldn't even have a setting for language
apps aren't ever intended to have that.
right
if you system is in spanish, than the app will be in spanish
and that I think is the push back to make.  The setting just needs to be gone.
go through apps on your phone...  find another app that has a language setting.
there aren't any
even though many many of them support multiple languages
yea i hear ya
ok i'll work on it
what section of the HIG is that in <@U0289USNA> ?
also <@U026PHQ3J> you know I would love it if you can help out this weekend and would appreciate any other weekend help. :grinning: think we all have a lot left to do

Add another vote for scott's comment above... the app should just adjust to the user's language setting for the device. The app should not try to set a different language than the user's preferred device language
<@U026PHQ3J> I will be in again this weekend if you want to meet up. Not sure which day but will let you know.
<@U02895311>: yep, all loud and clear. i sent an email off to the client recommending we nix it from the app. i'll follow up when I have a verdict or more info
thanks for the info and input guys
<@U02918BKW|john> has joined the channel
<@U026E0ZNR|trent> has joined the channel
<@U02895311>: yep! I think Saturday might be better for me, but I have no idea or preference atm
<@U026PHQ3J> I think saturday will be better for me as well, but will let you know.

<@U026103R3>:  HIG - towards the bottom in the section "Be Configurable If Necessary"  <https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/userexperience/conceptual/mobilehig/Integration.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40006556-CH61-SW6>

attachments.text: Provides guidelines for designing the user interface of an iOS app.
attachments.fallback: Provides guidelines for designing the user interface of an iOS app.

text: <@U026103R3>: I'm happy to discuss all of this language stuff with client(s). Can't get a read on what they're asking, but seems like we'll need to get on a call with them...
Which I'm happy to take.
<@U0265G76F>: I sent a note to Ru and CC'd John. I'll make sure he's up to speed so if a call is necessary next week (which it may be) he can loop you in
K. Please forward so I have context if/when needed
<@U0265G76F>: will do
Thx
